Detailed Description

A backpropagation synapse.

Creates a new backpropagation synapse by decorating a synapse.

Member Function Documentation

void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationSynapse.CalculateGradient (  ) 

Calculatates the gradient of the synapse using the backpropagation algorithm. (2.17).

override void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationSynapse.Connect (  )  [virtual]

Connects the (backpropagation) synapse.

A synapse is said to be connected if: 1. it is aware of its source neuron (and vice versa), and 2. it is aware of its target neuron (and vice versa).

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.SynapseDecorator.

override void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationSynapse.Disconnect (  )  [virtual]

Disconnects the (backpropagation) synapse.

A synapse is said to be disconnected if: 1. its source neuron is not aware of it (and vice versa) and 2. its target neuron is not aware of it (and vice versa).

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.SynapseDecorator.

override void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationSynapse.Initialize (  )  [virtual]

Initializes the synapse.
